divs: Sighting Detailscelebrating new year with my fiancee parents and 2 neighbors we where outside the house , at midnight the ligths of some houses went out ,were some fireworks lighting the sky but were well located , in some moment my sister in law shouted and said hey look at the sky , we looked up , I saw west of orion 2 lights one was rotating left since the other was doing to the right , because i was watching fireworks it took me some seconds to focus it properly , the orange lights begun to move northbound ...becuase I flew in costa rica , i know that at this time there is no overflying commercial aircrafts , an d NO local traffic at all , so we continued to cheer up and light some little fireworks , and after 5 minutes a orange light came from south in a straight line moving constantly due north , because I am a airline transport pilot I know the nav lights , it flew west of orion , the 7 saw it , going north bound it become to fade ...it was at 0600 UTC jan 01 -0630 UTC Jan 01 ,2012.
